article_title: 6 Fun Backgrounds to Use on Your Next Video Call
article_description: From the New York Public Library s Rose Reading Room to Schitt s Creek s Rosebud Motel  there s really something for everyone here
article_content: Channel your inner Nikola Tesla or Marie Curie by participating in actual scientific research  either out and about or without even leaving your couch  These projects unleash the power of the public to be places that researchers cant be and to spread the work   6933 chars
